# Aerial Alacrity (Spell)

[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]
**Level:** [[Sky (Domain)|Sky 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]
**Casting Time:** 1 swift action
**Components:** V
**Range:** Personal
**Target:** You
**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)
**Saving Throw:** None
**Spell Resistance:** No
**Source:** Races of the Wild (WotC), pg. 174

The target of this spell becomes quicker and more maneuverable while airborne. Its fly speed increases by 30 feet, and its maneuverability when flying improves by one category, to a maximum of perfect . While airborne, the target gains a +1 dodge bonus to Armor Class and on Reflex saves.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* *Aerial alacrity* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

*House Rule:* This spell does not stack with either *wings of air* or *greater wings of air*.
